description: Standards: new payload schemas follow the conventions in PRD ยง6 (tenantId required; transitions have previous/new; mutation events include updatedFields/changes)
Schema registry: every catalog event with payload_schema_ref resolves via schema registry (no 404) and validates example payloads
Event bus schema: every expanded event_type is accepted by the event bus schema/types and maps to a payload schema
Catalog migration: system_event_catalog contains entries (category/name/description/payload_schema_ref) for all events listed in event-proposals.md
Simulator: form-mode builder renders for each new catalog event and rejects invalid payloads with schema validation errors
Overlap handling: ticket message/comment and appointment/schedule-entry overlap decisions are encoded and documented (no duplicate/ambiguous triggers)
Tickets: status/priority transitions publish TICKET_STATUS_CHANGED and TICKET_PRIORITY_CHANGED with previous/new values
Tickets: assignment changes publish TICKET_ASSIGNED and TICKET_UNASSIGNED with previous/new assignee context
Tickets: reopen publishes TICKET_REOPENED with previous/new status and actor
Tickets: escalation/queue changes publish TICKET_ESCALATED and TICKET_QUEUE_CHANGED
Tickets: merge/split publish TICKET_MERGED and TICKET_SPLIT with source/target ids
Tickets: tag changes publish TICKET_TAGS_CHANGED (or TAG_APPLIED/TAG_REMOVED as decided) with added/removed tags
Tickets: communication events publish TICKET_MESSAGE_ADDED/TICKET_CUSTOMER_REPLIED/TICKET_INTERNAL_NOTE_ADDED (or map to existing comment events) with correct visibility/channel
Tickets: time logging publishes TICKET_TIME_ENTRY_ADDED with billable/minutes metadata
Tickets: SLA stage enter/met/breached publish events only when SLA module enabled; payload includes stage + target timestamps
Tickets: approval requested/granted/rejected publish events only when approvals enabled; payload includes approvalRequestId and type
Scheduling: create/reschedule/cancel/complete/no-show emit appointment/schedule events with start/end times and timezone
Scheduling: assignment changes emit APPOINTMENT_ASSIGNED (or mapped schedule-entry equivalent) with previous/new assignee
Scheduling: schedule blocks emit SCHEDULE_BLOCK_CREATED and SCHEDULE_BLOCK_DELETED with owner context
Scheduling: capacity thresholds emit CAPACITY_THRESHOLD_REACHED only when configured, with team/date metrics
Field ops: dispatch lifecycle emits TECHNICIAN_DISPATCHED/EN_ROUTE/ARRIVED/CHECKED_OUT only when supported
Projects: updates emit PROJECT_UPDATED with updatedFields/changes
Projects: status transitions emit PROJECT_STATUS_CHANGED with previous/new status
Projects: task creation/assignment/status/complete emit PROJECT_TASK_CREATED/ASSIGNED/STATUS_CHANGED/COMPLETED
Projects: dependency blocked/unblocked emit PROJECT_TASK_DEPENDENCY_BLOCKED/UNBLOCKED
Projects: approvals emit PROJECT_APPROVAL_REQUESTED/GRANTED/REJECTED only when enabled
Billing: invoice send/status/due-date change emit INVOICE_SENT/INVOICE_STATUS_CHANGED/INVOICE_DUE_DATE_CHANGED
Billing: overdue/write-off emit INVOICE_OVERDUE and INVOICE_WRITTEN_OFF with monetary context
Billing: payments emit PAYMENT_RECORDED/APPLIED/FAILED/REFUNDED with invoice application details
Billing: credits emit CREDIT_NOTE_CREATED/APPLIED/VOIDED with amounts and affected invoiceId when applicable
Billing: contracts emit CONTRACT_CREATED/UPDATED/STATUS_CHANGED and CONTRACT_RENEWAL_UPCOMING with renewal timing
Billing: recurring billing runs emit RECURRING_BILLING_RUN_STARTED/COMPLETED/FAILED with summary counts
CRM: clients emit CLIENT_CREATED/UPDATED/STATUS_CHANGED/OWNER_ASSIGNED/MERGED/ARCHIVED
CRM: contacts emit CONTACT_CREATED/UPDATED/PRIMARY_SET/ARCHIVED/MERGED
CRM: interactions/notes emit INTERACTION_LOGGED and NOTE_CREATED with entity linkage
Tags: tag definition/apply/remove emit TAG_DEFINITION_CREATED/UPDATED and TAG_APPLIED/TAG_REMOVED with entityType/entityId
Documents: uploads/deletes emit DOCUMENT_UPLOADED and DOCUMENT_DELETED with storage metadata
Documents: associate/detach emit DOCUMENT_ASSOCIATED and DOCUMENT_DETACHED with entity references
Documents: generation emits DOCUMENT_GENERATED for supported generation paths with sourceType/sourceId
Documents: signature request/signed/expired emit DOCUMENT_SIGNATURE_REQUESTED/DOCUMENT_SIGNED/DOCUMENT_SIGNATURE_EXPIRED only when supported
Email: inbound replies emit INBOUND_EMAIL_REPLY_RECEIVED when reply parsing/matching succeeds
Email: outbound send pipeline emits OUTBOUND_EMAIL_QUEUED/OUTBOUND_EMAIL_SENT/OUTBOUND_EMAIL_FAILED
Email: delivery/bounce/complaint/unsubscribe emits EMAIL_DELIVERED/EMAIL_BOUNCED/EMAIL_COMPLAINT_RECEIVED/EMAIL_UNSUBSCRIBED where supported
Notifications: send/deliver/fail/read emits NOTIFICATION_SENT/DELIVERED/FAILED/READ for supported channels
Surveys/CSAT: survey lifecycle emits SURVEY_SENT/RESPONSE_RECEIVED/REMINDER_SENT/EXPIRED and CSAT alerts emit CSAT_ALERT_TRIGGERED
Integrations: sync lifecycle emits INTEGRATION_SYNC_STARTED/COMPLETED/FAILED with summary/error shape
Integrations: webhook receipt emits INTEGRATION_WEBHOOK_RECEIVED with safe raw payload handling/redaction
Integrations: connect/disconnect emits INTEGRATION_CONNECTED/INTEGRATION_DISCONNECTED
Integrations: token expiring/refresh failed emits INTEGRATION_TOKEN_EXPIRING/INTEGRATION_TOKEN_REFRESH_FAILED
Integrations: mapping/config changes emit EXTERNAL_MAPPING_CHANGED with mappingType + previous/new values
Assets: lifecycle emits ASSET_CREATED/UPDATED/ASSIGNED/UNASSIGNED/WARRANTY_EXPIRING with consistent owner fields
Media: upload + processing emits FILE_UPLOADED/MEDIA_PROCESSING_SUCCEEDED/MEDIA_PROCESSING_FAILED with stable file ids
